name: Lonley
content: raging storms and oceans tear us apart
my dear you are not here
something strange has gotton over me
lonely in my heart heaven falls as
caught in a spell of this heartache
your lovely name in my window
oh where on where shall i place
lonely in my heart heaven falls
as i reach for the sky
caught in a spell of this heartache
your lovely name in my window
the flowing tears from my eyes
the show is over we will never
lonely in my heart heaven falls as
caught in a spell of this heartache
your lovely name in my window
